Impact

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ background_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”6%||6%||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.4″ width=”65%” width_tablet=”65%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”65%” max_width_tablet=”65%” max_width_phone=”80%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”65%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Age of Efficiency Text” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_text_color=”#7dcbb6″ header_2_text_color=”#7DCBB6″ max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” animation_delay=”500ms” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Approach to Impact, ESG, and DEI

Blackhorn’s investment strategy strives to improve how our industries power, move, and build our world. We believe taking a triple bottom line approach is not only the right thing to do, but it also provides real economic opportunities to create more value for our portfolio companies, investors, and the world.

Driving a positive societal impact while elevating the importance of ESG and DEI management is core to Blackhorn’s investment approach. That is why we integrate impact potential into our pre-investment decision-making, our investment diligence process, and our post-investment support, value-add, and monitoring. Take a look at our impact, ESG, and DEI policies to learn more![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″
